executable.title: Register Images BatchMake
executable.description: Provides rigid, affine, and BSpline registration methods via a simple GUI
executable.contributor: Stephen R Aylward and Julien Finet at Kitware Inc.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.\nhttp://www.batchmake.org

string-enumeration.name: RunningMode_Grid
string-enumeration.description: Running Mode: Where the module shall be executed? On your local machine or on a grid?
string-enumeration.label: Running Mode

directory.name: InputDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid input directory
directory.description: Directory where the input data are. Necessary if dealing with relative input paths.

directory.name: OutputDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid output directory
directory.description: Directory where the output data are. Necessary if dealing with relative output paths.

directory.name: WorkingDirectory_Grid
directory.label: Grid working directory
directory.description: Directory where the condor scripts are written.

string-enumeration.name: TransferFile_Grid
string-enumeration.description: Type of files that shall be transfered by the grid
string-enumeration.label: Transfer File

file.name: fixedImage
file.label: Fixed Image
file.description: Image which defines the space into which the moving image is registered

directory.name: movingImage_Directory
directory.label: Moving Image Directory
directory.description: The transform goes from the fixed image's space into the moving image's space

string.name: movingImage_Mask
string.label: Moving Image Mask
string.description: The transform goes from the fixed image's space into the moving image's space

file.name: loadTransform
file.label: Load transform
file.description: Load a transform that is immediately applied to the moving image

file.name: saveTransform
file.label: Save transform
file.description: Save the transform that results from registration

string-enumeration.name: initialization
string-enumeration.description: Method to prime the registration process
string-enumeration.label: Initialization

parameters.label: Advanced Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how registration is performed

string-enumeration.name: verbosityLevel
string-enumeration.description: Level of detail of reporting progress
string-enumeration.label: Verbosity level

boolean.name: sampleFromOverlap
boolean.description: Limit metric evaluation to the fixed image region overlapped by the moving image
boolean.label: Sample from fixed/moving overlap

float.name: sampleIntensityPortion
float.description: Limit metric evaluation to the fixed image points at or above the threshold (as a percent of intensity range of the image)
float.label: Fixed image intensity percentage threshold

integer.name: randomNumberSeed
integer.description: Seed to generate a consistent random number sequence
integer.label: Random number seed (0=none)

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of CPU threads to use
integer.label: Number of threads (0=max)

boolean.name: minimizeMemory
boolean.description: Reduce the amount of memory required at the cost of increased computation time
boolean.label: Minimize memory

boolean.name: useWindowedSinc
boolean.description: Use Windowed Sinc interpolation when generating the final resampled moving image
boolean.label: Use windowed sinc for final interpolation

parameters.label: Registration Testing Parameters
parameters.description: Functions for comparing registration results with a baseline image

file.name: baselineImage
file.label: Baseline Image
file.description: Image against which the resampled moving image will be compared

integer.name: baselineNumberOfFailedPixelsTolerance
integer.label: Number of Failed Pixels Tolerance
integer.description: Maximum number of pixels that can differ and the test pass

double.name: baselineIntensityTolerance
double.label: Intensity Tolerance
double.description: Maximum intensity difference for pixels to be considered matching

integer.name: baselineRadiusTolerance
integer.label: Radius Tolerance
integer.description: Maximum neighborhood that will be searched to find a matching pixel

file.name: baselineDifferenceImage
file.label: Baseline Difference Image
file.description: Result from subtracting the registered moving image from the baseline image

file.name: baselineResampledMovingImage
file.label: Baseline Resampled Moving Image
file.description: Result resampling the moving image to the space of the baseline image

parameters.label: Advanced Initial Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how initial registration is performed

float-vector.name: fixedLandmarks
float-vector.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the fixed image
float-vector.label: Fixed landmarks

float-vector.name: movingLandmarks
float-vector.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the moving image
float-vector.label: Moving landmarks
